name: Taxi Car Cab: Driver Taxi
description:
Taxi Car Cab: Driver Taxi!!!
Get behind the wheel of the most famous taxis and take people where they need to go. Drive the yellow New York Taxi, experience the right hand side driving with London Cab, take the german cars for a ride! Many cities
Features
• Detailed maps
• Smooth and realistic car handling
• Lots of taxis from around the world
• Free Ride mode
• Multiplayer mode
• Detailed vehicle interiors
• Realistic damage system
